trends: There have been no other sightings in Boa Esperança
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I saw the UFO and I shot it.
divs: sighting detailsi'm the president of brazilian ufology center in brazil. the picture and the footage was made by luis braga who sent it to me. i also interviewed him. he told me this fact. i'm an amator photographer. i was waking up early and it was still dark because i would like to take the picture of the borning sun. i was with my camera with me. when i was leaving my house i just saw a strange object andi started to shoot it. i made three pictures and than i turned my camera to video to try to do a footage. those are the pictures i have and the footage. the object speed was realy fast. more than 1.500km\h. the object trajectory was not a line. it was almost a line, but it did some turns. the object wasn't to high. it n the same position like a plane in the sky. my sight had 34 seconds. 12 seconsds is my footage, and the rest of the time i used to make the pictures. please, see attached the film and the footage. i really would like to know if i shot an ufo. can you help me. in the footage all you can here is my breathing and the chicks i have in my back yard. now i'm asking mufon opinion in this case. can you help us in brazil. our website is http:\\www.cubbrasil.net say hi to my friend mr. james carrion. all the best, milton frank brazilian ufology center president
